item.title: Flytipping........as usual, 25th December
item.description:
Dirty sodden mattress left with other items added by a resident. Moved items away block gate entrance as it attracts more dumping in a secluded corner which then blocks the fire exit. Tedious.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pitman Street, Camberwell, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Closed car park, 25th December
item.description:
The car park at Oakhill Park was closed on Christmas day. There were about 500 runners taking part in the 5k park run at 9am. Nobody could park their cars in the car park. So, why was the car park closed? Could the council ensure that this car park is open on Christmas Day, 2026, please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lancelot Gardens, Brunswick Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
